title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: There is no information provided on the observed behavior.
EB: The expected behavior is that when clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key.
3. Focus should move to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
